text: Marco Tecchio (born 31 August 1994 in Valdagno) is an Italian former professional cyclist, who rode professionally for in 2014 and in 2015 and 2016. ==Major results== ;2015 :5th Overall Giro del Friuli Venezia Giulia :5th Tour of Almaty ;2016 :1st Overall Tour of Bulgaria ::1st Stage 3 :3rd Trofeo Piva :10th Memorial Marco Pantani ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Marco Tecchio
